package.name: ur5_gripper_moveit_config
package.description: A modified package, created from the one generated by Moveit Setup Assistant to be used with UR5 robot with Robotiq 2F-85 gripper Files modified- Config files: joint_limits.yaml, ompl_planning.yaml, ur5_robotiq_85.urdf.xacro Launch files: ur5_arm.launch.py, move_group.launch.py, demo.launch.py Files added - isaac_ros_cumotion_planning.yaml
package.author: Neel Jawale
